original_text: Paul went back upstairs. He shared bread with the believers and he ate more food. Paul talked to them for a long time, until the sun rose in the morning. Then he left Troas.
korean_text: 올라가 떡을 떼어 먹고 오랫동안 곧 날이 새기까지 이야기하고 떠나니라

sentences.original_text: He shared bread with the believers

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 더 많은 음식을 먹었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Paul talked to them for a long time,
until the sun rose in the morning.
